channel.title: Do you guys believe in the illuminati?
channel.description: So what do you think? Are people putting shit in our food & water to take away 20% of our IQ so we cant really figure out whats going on? Should we go kill & eat wild deer & kill the president?

item.title: Do you guys believe in the illuminati?
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

they’re real

The Illuminati is a team of immortals who have been in existence since the dawn of time (give or take a few zelphas) they exist to shepherd us into the brighter tomorrow.

Read full topic

item.title: Do you guys believe in the illuminati?

Too much proof around, so yes.

proof? Yeah proof as soft as Fat Bastards belly. Where is all your solid hard proof? As casey said they were an organisation in the 1700s and anyone claiming to be heirs are fake.

YES!!! Illimunati is real! :eek: I swear i used to eat chicken nuggets in 1st grade. My mom made me stop. So like 9 years later, I’m like 200% smarter than when i last ate chicken nuggets. Illuminati was totally sprinkling powder on chicken nuggets. dont eat chicken nuggets.

So what do you think? Are people putting shit in our food & water to take away 20% of our IQ so we cant really figure out whats going on? Should we go kill & eat wild deer & kill the president?

item.title: Do you guys believe in the illuminati?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:10, topic:451353”]-says in a shaky voice-

It’s a conspiracy by the government to make us stupider so that way we don’t get the idea to revolt![/quote]
Actually you could argue that the American dream has that function. Intentional? we can not know. It is not by stupefying you, but give you the idea of United States, the best country on the earth. United states, the land of possibilities. Fuck the class divide by income. That is a red herring. For with it you can argue that there is a much higher class dynamics than it really is. The truth is that is only two classes that matters.

Read full topic

item.title: Do you guys believe in the illuminati?
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

The food thing is true. There’s flavor enhancers in almost everything, which is the reason for obesitas and also causes damage to your brain. However, it’s not something this Illuminati did to kill us or something else. It’s just a way of companies to make you addicted to their food to get lots of money.
